mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Animals and Insects" and etc; 01 of 06
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 33-74, cloth sleeve"The Truth About Darwinism"; Reoccurring section of a periodical for BENA (British Empire Naturalist Association), where an ongoing discussion of multiple aspects of Darwinism is addressed by experts who write-in, along with editor comments. Select pages pulled for Faulds's notes. Included articles in this batch: "Insects and Flowers" by Lord Avebury, "Origin of Flowers" by V. M., and partial "Animals and Insects" by Herbert S. Colthurst. The publication's editorial is also included.; E. Kay Robinson (E. K. R.), ed., London, p. 153-158, contents no. 4 and 16, Country-Side; 6 pages; DF n.a.
